sections.summary:
General Associates with emphasis in Business Admin. and Communications Current 3.0 GPA Volunteer Junior Achievement teacher Grades 1st
and 3rd 3 yrs. as a volunteer in special needs classroom Routinely helped as many as 350 customers each day in a high-volume retail Store.
Consistently exceeding daily sales targets with an average of $3000 in sales each day. Over 13 years in retail/customer service Has managed over
13 people at one time.
